Updates to chapter

Listing by date:

Sections 3 and 5 have been updated and Section 7.3 has been added, to reflect
changes made to the security inadmissibility and ministerial relief provisions that have
come into force following the Royal Assent of the Faster Removal of Foreign Criminals
Act. The provision on espionage has been amended. The provision on subversion
against any democratic government, institution or process has been established under a
new paragraph, namely A34(1)(b.1). Ministerial relief provisions under subsections
A34(2), A35(2) and A37(2) have been repealed and replaced by section A42.1.

Changes were made to ENF 1 at 7.11 to correctly reflect the legislation.

Changes were made to chapter ENF 1 to remove references to “omissions” in the
context of criminal inadmissibility. The term, which was contained in the provisions of
the former Act, is not contained in the IRPA.
